arStrings.szText: Your {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} Skills are now also {c_important}Core{/c} Skills that have no Cooldowns but cost Fury, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of normal damage. Their Fury costs are reduced by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} for any additional Charges the Skill would have had.
